%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
bulkmanifestdetail
AS
SELECT
 p.lms_parcel_weight as parcelweight
,p.lms_parcel_chargeweight as parcelchargeweight
,p.lms_parcel_volweight as parcelvolweight
,p.lms_parcel_id as parcelid
,p.lms_parcel_orderbillcustid as billingcustomerid
,p.lms_parcel_orderbillcustname as billingcustomername
,t.lms_track_loadid as loadid
,p.lms_parcel_orderid as orderid
,o.lms_order_corderno as corderno
,p.lms_parcel_orderdelivercustid as deliverycustomerid
,p.lms_parcel_orderdelivercustname as deliverycustomername
,COALESCE(p.lms_parcel_acceptancedate,p.lms_parcel_handoverdate) as date
,p.lms_parcel_acceptancedate as acceptancedate
,p.lms_parcel_handoverdate as handoverdate
,p.lms_parcel_waybillid as waybillid
,l.lms_location_description as currentlocation
,z.lms_zone_description as zonedescription
,t.lms_track_loadid as manifestid

FROM rptparcellevellimitload p
LEFT JOIN rpttracklevel t on t.lms_track_parcelid = p.lms_parcel_id
LEFT JOIN storder o on o.lms_order_id = p.lms_parcel_orderid
LEFT JOIN stlocation l on l.lms_location_id = p.lms_parcel_locid
LEFT JOIN stdeliverypickupcustomer dc on dc.lms_customer_id = p.lms_parcel_orderdelivercustid
LEFT JOIN stsroute sr on sr.lms_sroute_id = dc.lms_customer_srouteid
LEFT JOIN stzone z on z.lms_zone_id = sr.lms_sroute_zoneid
